import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectShop=function selectShop(state){return state.shop;};export var selectCollections=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.collections;});export var selectCollectionsForPerview=createSelector([selectCollections],function(collections){return collections?Object.keys(collections).map(function(key){return collections[key];}):[];});export var selectCollection=function selectCollection(collectionUlParam){//  const iD =COLLECTION_ID_MAP[collectionUlParam]
return createSelector([selectCollections],function(collections){return collections?collections[collectionUlParam]:null;});};export var selectIsCollectionFetching=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.isFetching;});export var selectIsCollectionsLoaded=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return!!shop.collections;});
